title: Diwali: Festival of Lights
image_desc: [Image Description in English only: A vibrant image of Diwali decorations, including diyas, rangoli, and fireworks.]
narration: Welcome to this presentation on Diwali, the Festival of Lights! Diwali is a major festival celebrated by Hindus, Jains, and Sikhs across the world. It's a time for joy, celebration, and the triumph of good over evil.
